title: Written in the Stars
description: **"Written in the Stars" is a fanfiction story, the one which brought me to the attention of my publisher.**Edward is king of a dying race, his planet torn by civil war. Bella is abducted to become his bride. From college student to Queen... Can she learn to love this strange man and help save his people? AU/OOC. Rated M for lemons, violence and mature themes.
author: Lissa Bryan
